text: The State of Syria (, ) was a French Mandate state created by decree of 5 December 1924, with effect from 1 January 1925, from the union of the State of Aleppo and the State of Damascus. == Other websites == * Mandat Syrie-Liban ... (1920-1946) * La Syrie et le mandat français (1920-1946) * Les Relations franco-libanaises dans le cadre des relations Internationales * Mandat français au Proche-Orient * Category:Former countries in the Middle East Category:1925 establishments in Asia
title: State of Syria (1925–1930)
